resources.string: Name and URL must not be empty.
No base URLs available. Please add one first.

1. Add URLs: Tap the plus button (+) to add a new base URL (e.g., 'https://archive.ph/') with a name.

2. Manage Entries: Tap the pencil icon (âœï¸) to edit an entry, or the trash can (ğŸ—‘ï¸) to delete it.

3. Combine & Share: In another app (e.g., your browser), go to 'Share' and select 'UrlCombiner'. The shared URL will be automatically combined with your base URL and opened in the browser.
